Text: Welcome to our Amazon Polly voiceover generation service. This is a test of our text-to-speech capabilities.
Please upload your spreadsheet with ID and Text columns to generate professional voiceovers.
Our system supports multiple voices and languages for your convenience.
Thank you for using our service. We hope you find it helpful for your projects.
This is a longer text sample to test how our system handles more complex sentences with punctuation, numbers like 123, and various formatting.
